data.message:
My name isn't stan but I have loved youre music ever sens when it reached us here in Finland. You gave me strenght when I hit rockbottom and I wish you get this but couldn't find any other to say this to you. My two children gave a reason to get my shit together and not give up but I hope you reed this and I wish you all the best and thanks.. Just to chat, truly yours, your biggest fan
 This is Pasi
